35.description: Used in drop shadow for dialogs in light theme

45.description: Used in drop shadow for dialogs

circle.description: A completely rounded border radius, used to create circles.

display-1.description: Display 1. Custom element. Used for Splash Screens.

display-2.description: Display 2. Custom element. Used for Splash Screens.

monospace-1.description:
Monospace 1
Used for Global Status Bar clock.

default.description: The background color of base elements, like the app or popup menus.

header.description: The background color for the header of base elements.

hover.description: The background color of base elements, like popup menus, when they are hovered over.

selected.description: The background color of base elements, like popup menus, when they are selected.

default.description: The background color of surface elements, like panels or dialogs.

header.description: The background color for the header of surface elements, including dialogs and table headers.

hover.description: The background color of surface elements, like cards or table rows, when they are hovered over.

selected.description: The background color of surface elements, like cards or table rows, when they are selected.

default.description: The primary color used for the backgrounds of interactive elements.

hover.description: The hover color used for the backgrounds of interactive elements.

primary.description: The primary color used for text within the application.

secondary.description: The color used for text when less emphasis is needed.

placeholder.description: The text color used for placeholder text in input and form fields.

inverse.description: The color used for text on reversed backgrounds.

default.description: The primary color used for interactive text elements.

hover.description: The hover color used for interactive text elements.

white.description: Text that is white across all themes. Used for classification and status banners that do not change color in various themes.

black.description: Text that is black across all themes. Used for classification and status banners that do not change color in various themes.

error.description: The text color used for form error messages.

default.description: The primary color used for the border of interactive elements.

hover.description: The hover color used for the border of interactive elements.

muted.description: A muted version of the primary color used for the border of interactive elements that don't need to be as strong as the primary color.

error.description: The border color used for form error borders.

critical.description: The color used to indicate items with a Critical status. Critical, form error, alert, emergency, urgent.

serious.description: The color used to indicate items with a Serious status. Serious, warning, error, needs attention.

caution.description: The color used to indicate items with a Caution status. Caution, unstable, unsatisfactory.

normal.description: The color used to indicate items with a Normal status. Normal, on, ok, fine, go, satisfactory, success.

standby.description: The color used to indicate items with a Standby status. Standby, available, enabled.

off.description: The color used to indicate items with an Off status. Off, unavailable, disabled.

topsecretsci.description: The color used to indicate the Top Secret//SCI classification.

topsecret.description: The color used to indicate the Top Secret classification.

secret.description: The color used to indicate the Secret classification.

confidential.description: The color used to indicate the Confidential classification.

cui.description: The color used to indicate the CUI classification.

unclassified.description: The color used to indicate the Unclassified classification.

overlay.description: Drop shadow for overlays like Dialogs and overlay panels

default.description: The color used for links in default state.

hover.description: The color used for links in hover state. Links do not change color on hover.

border.description: The border color used for the Card component.
The border color used for the Container component.

topsecretsci.description: The background color of the Top Secret//SCI classification banner.

topsecret.description: The background color of the Top Secret classification banner.

secret.description: The background color of the Secret classification banner.

confidential.description: The background color of the Confidential classification banner.

cui.description: The background color of the CUI classification banner.

unclassified.description: The background color of the Unclassified classification banner.

on-dark.description: The fill color of the Critical status symbol on a dark background.

on-light.description: The fill color of the Critical status symbol on a light background.

on-dark.description: The fill color of the Serious status symbol on a dark background.

on-light.description: The fill color of the Serious status symbol on a light background.

on-dark.description: The fill color of the Caution status symbol on a dark background.

on-light.description: The fill color of the Caution status symbol on a light background.

on-dark.description: The fill color of the Normal status symbol on a dark background.

on-light.description: The fill color of the Normal status symbol on a light background.

on-dark.description: The fill color of the Standby status symbol on a dark background.

on-light.description: The fill color of the Standby status symbol on a light background.

on-dark.description: The fill color of the Off status symbol on a dark background.

on-light.description: The fill color of the Off status symbol on a light background.

critical.description: The border color of the Critical status symbol on light backgrounds.

serious.description: The border color of the Serious status symbol on light backgrounds.

caution.description: The border color of the Caution status symbol on light backgrounds.

normal.description: The border color of the Normal status symbol on light backgrounds.

standby.description: The border color of the Standby status symbol on light backgrounds.

off.description: The border color of the Off status symbol on light backgrounds.

on-dark.description: The border width for status symbols on a dark background

on-light.description: The border width for status symbols on a light background

text.description: The primary text color used within the Global Status Bar.
